HotelElement.Name: Holiday Inn Express - Sainte Musse Hotel

Description.Text: Just a 10-minute drive from the centre of Toulon and its port, the modern, purpose-built Holiday Inn Express - Sainte Musse also provides easy access the beaches of the Mourillon and is equally suited to business and leisure travellers alike. The hotel`s 81 bright and spacious guestrooms feature contemporary d√©cor and come with a private bathroom, double-glazing, individual air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and tea/coffee making facilities. A daily Express Start buffet breakfast, featuring a choice of juices, cereals and pastries is included in the room rate and in the evenings guests can relax with drinks at the bar, or on the hotel`s terrace. Other benefits include 24-hour reception with express check-in and check-out services, plus free access to a business corner and complimentary car parking.
